set.name: Set
set.description: Set attributes of a variable entity.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Entity id of the variable whose value will be set.

value.name: Value
value.description: The new value for the variable entity.

value_template.name: Value Template
value_template.description: The new value template for the variable entity.

attributes.name: Attributes
attributes.description: Additional attributes to set for the variable entity.

tracked_entity_id.name: Tracked Entity ID
tracked_entity_id.description: The new list of entities for the variable entity to track.

tracked_event_type.name: Tracked Event Type
tracked_event_type.description: The new list of event types for the variable entity to track.

query.name: Query
query.description: An SQL QUERY string, should return 1 result at most.

column.name: Column
column.description: The SQL COLUMN to select from the result of the SQL QUERY.

restore.name: Restore
restore.description: The new restore value for the variable entity.

force_update.name: Force Update
force_update.description: The new force_update value for the variable entity.

unit_of_measurement.name: Unit of Measurement
unit_of_measurement.description: The new unit of measurement for the variable entity.

icon.name: Icon
icon.description: The new icon for the variable entity.

icon_template.name: Icon Template
icon_template.description: The new icon template for the variable entity.

entity_picture.name: Entity Picture
entity_picture.description: The new picture for the variable entity.

entity_picture_template.name: Entity Picture Template
entity_picture_template.description: The new picture template for the variable entity.

update.name: Update
update.description: Force a variable to update its state and attributes.

entity_id.name: Entity ID
entity_id.description: Entity id of the variable that will be updated.
